ResearchProjectDef.label: Fast cutting
ResearchProjectDef.description: It can be more fast to cut a variety of blocks into Composite stone, but it will affect the production rate each time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Delicate cutting
ResearchProjectDef.description: It can be more effective to cut a variety of blocks into Composite stone, but it will affect the operation time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fast cutting batch
ResearchProjectDef.description: It can be more fast to cut a variety batch of blocks into Composite stone, but it will affect the production rate each time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Delicate cutting batch
ResearchProjectDef.description: It can be more effective to cut a variety batch of blocks into Composite stone, but it will affect the operation time.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Master cutting
ResearchProjectDef.description: It can be more effective to cut a variety batch of blocks into Composite stone, fast and more production.
